metadata.title: CVE-2024-39936 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in HTTP2 in Qt before 5.15.18, 6.x before 6.2.13,6.3.x through 6.5.x before 6.5.7, and 6.6.x through 6.7.x before 6.7.3.Code to make security-relevant decisions about an established connectionmay execute too early, because the encrypted() signal has not yet beenemitted and processed..

criterions.comment: qtbase-opensource-src package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
